description:
Brijesh is given an assignment on strings and he is in hospital. So he need your help to complete the assignment to pass the semester. Given a string s containing just the characters **'(', ')', '{', '}', '[' and ']'**, determine if the input string is valid.

#### An input string is valid if:

- Open brackets must be closed by the same type of brackets.
-  Open brackets must be closed in the correct order.
- Every close bracket has a corresponding open bracket of the same type.

#### Input Format: 
- single line consisting of brackets

#### Output Format:
 - Print **true** or **false** (in lowercase)

#### Constraints:
- 1<=str<=10000
title: Valid Parenthese
